Uses of Lattice in cellularAutomata.lattice
 

Classes in cellularAutomata.lattice that implement Lattice
 class BahrLattice
          A two-dimensional square lattice with wrap around boundary conditions and a nearest-neighbor neighborhood that varies with time.
 class FourNeighborSquareLattice
          A simple two-dimensional square lattice with wrap around boundary conditions and four nearest neighbors (von Neumann neighborhood).
 class GlobalSquareLattice
          A simple two-dimensional square lattice with every cell being a neighbor to every other cell.
 class HexagonalLattice
          A hexagonal lattice with wrap around boundary conditions.
 class MargolusLattice
          A two-dimensional square lattice with wrap around boundary conditions and a nearest-neighbor neighborhood that varies with time and position.
 class MargolusOneDimensionalLattice
          A one-dimensional version of the Margolus lattice.
 class MooreRadiusOneDimLattice
          A one-dimensional square lattice with wrap around boundary conditions and a Moore neighborhood of radius r.
 class MooreRadiusTwoDimLattice
          A two-dimensional square lattice with wrap around boundary conditions and a Moore neighborhood of radius r.
 class NextNearestOneDimLattice
          A standard one-dimensional lattice with nearest and next-nearest neighbors, and wrap around boundary conditions.
 class NextNearestSquareLattice
          A simple two-dimensional square lattice with wrap around boundary conditions and eight nearest and 16 next-nearest neighbors.
 class OneDimensionalLattice
          A one-dimensional lattice.
 class RandomAsymmetricSquareLattice
          A simple two-dimensional square lattice with random neighbors for each cell.
 class RandomGaussianLattice
          A simple two-dimensional square lattice where each cell has random neighbors distributed normally about the cell with a standard deviation of 1.
 class RandomSmallWorldLattice
          A simple two-dimensional square lattice where each cell has random neighbors distributed with power-law connectivity.
 class SquareLattice
          A simple two-dimensional square lattice with eight nearest neighbors (Moore neighborhood).
 class StandardOneDimensionalLattice
          A standard one-dimensional lattice with nearest neighbors and wrap around boundary conditions.
 class TriangularLattice
          A simple two-dimensional triangular lattice with wrap around boundary conditions and 3 nearest neighbors.
 class TwelveNeighborTriangularLattice
          A simple two-dimensional triangular lattice with wrap around boundary conditions and 12 nearest neighbors.
 class TwoDimensionalLattice
          A two-dimensional lattice.
 class VonNeumannRadiusLattice
          A two-dimensional diamond-shaped square lattice with wrap around boundary conditions and a von Neumann neighborhood of radius r.
